name: fSpy Project
summary: An FSPY file is a project created by fSpy, an open source program used to set the camera and focal lengths of 3D scenes in Blender. It contains various parameters, such as the camera position, camera orientation, and vanishing point axes, of an imported image that are used to recreate the area as a 3D scene in Blender. FSPY files also store metadata, such as the project version, the size of the imported image, and JSON information describing the project state.
